topics.body:
Speaking of burgers, if you blended some bear, bison, lion and crocodile meat into a single patty, then you put the patty in a burger with some bacon, you would have the manliest burger in the world.

And yes, lion meat is legal in America. But that likely won't be for long, thanks to stupid activists.
